name: Choose Your Adventure!
description:
This is an experimental project written entirely in HTML5/CSS. I was influenced by the Flickgame engine, but was not satisfied with its limitations. So, I decided to design a clickable game in HTML/CSS. More details on the tools used in the credits part of the game.

It was easier than I thought it would be...

IFID is CB2AE861-2975-4337-8D9A-DA7343260BA9
